text: Toto okhusitia(emiesi chioluyali chiletsa lwangu tawe), ni ukhumetekha mubukhayi khulwako abakhayi bakosibungwa, bafuchililanga omwika mulala ne okundi bakhaya, mbu khobakhole eshichelo shiechindi chilia echia Nyasaye, kho bakhole bia Nyasaye yakana, baronelwa obubii bwebikhole biabu, ne Nyasaye shalunjisinjia abakhayi tawe
